types.section:
{{fr-noun|m}}

# {{lb|fr|soccer}} [[step over]], [[pedalada]] {{gloss|a dribbling move, or feint, in football (soccer), used to fool a defensive player into thinking the offensive player, in possession of the ball, is going to move in a direction he does not intend to move in}}
types.html:
passement de jambe m (plural passements de jambe)

  1. (soccer) step over, pedalada (a dribbling move, or feint, in football (soccer), used to fool a defensive player into thinking the offensive player, in possession of the ball, is going to move in a direction he does not intend to move in)
trans: step over, pedalada , used to fool a defensive player into thinking the offensive player, in possession of the ball, is going to move in a direction he does not intend to move in)

title: passement de jambe
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /pas.mɑ̃ d(ə) ʒɑ̃b/
